entries.text: Begin your journey into Minecraft Legends! Watch the legend unfold as the piglins begin their rampage across the Overworld.

entries.title: Discover the magic of Spellcraft!
entries.text: Become the most powerful spellcrafter in this enchanting new adventure! Harness elemental spells and defeat fierce foes!

highlight.title: The Marketplace Celebration Continues!
highlight.description: The Marketplace sale continues until July 12 - with one free Character Creator item for every day of the sale! And enjoy Spellcraft, the epic new adventure from Gamemode One. Become the most powerful spellcrafter in this enchanting new adventure! Harness elemental spells and defeat fierce foes!

entries.title: Java and Bedrock are now together on PC!
entries.text: Create, explore, survive, repeat. Now Minecraft: Java Edition and Bedrock Edition are a package deal for Windows!

highlight.title: Java & Bedrock now are together on PC!
highlight.description: Create, explore, survive, repeat. Get Minecraft: Java Edition and Bedrock Edition as a package deal for Windows! And even more exciting: this means if you already owned one of the games, NOW you ALSO own the other!

entries.title: Marketplace 5 Year Celebration
entries.text: From May 24 to July 12 delve into five years of fan favorites & meet the creators behind the most popular Marketplace worlds.

highlight.title: Marketplace 5 Year Celebration
highlight.description: We're celebrating 5 years of Minecraft Marketplace! Between May 24 and July 12 delve into five years of fan favorites and meet the creators behind the most popular Marketplace worlds. Nab limited-time discounts and even a new, FREE map: Marketplace Creator Tycoon by Jigarbov Productions. Join the celebration!

entries.title: Celebrate May the 4th!
entries.text: From May 3 to May 9, get 33% off Star Wars content & a free R2-D2 beanie Character Creator Item in the Dressing Room!

highlight.title: Celebrate May the 4th!
highlight.description: May the Fourth be with you! Between May 3 and May 9, get 33% off Star Wars content such as Solo: A Star Wars Story Pack, 4 skin packs, and a free R2-D2 beanie Character Creator Item in the Dressing Room!

entries.title: New on Realms: Affordable Housing
entries.text: 9 new listings of maps to take up residence in!

entries.title: Luminous Night is live!
entries.text: Everything you need to know about the latest seasonal adventure!

highlight.title: Explore the Tower in a whole new light!
highlight.description: Become the avatar once more & earn radiant rewards in Luminous Night – Minecraft Dungeons’ 2nd seasonal adventure. Explore the Tower by night in a whole new light with floors that include mysterious murals, perplexing puzzles, & fiery foes. What will you discover before daybreak?

entries.title: The Marketplace Spring Sale is here!
entries.text: Spring is here! Flowers are blooming, bees are buzzing, but most importantly: there’s a sale happening at Minecraft Marketplace!

highlight.title: A Spring Fling with daily doorbusters!
highlight.description:
Marketplace Spring Sale is back from April 12 -18 with the free Cute Kitty skin pack, 2 free items in the Dressing Room and up to 75% off select content!

*Spring Sale requires latest Minecraft: Bedrock Edition verion with access to Marketplace & runs 4/12/22 to 4/18/22.  Limit 1 of each item per person/account.

entries.title: Block Friday Marketplace Event
entries.text: Celebrate Block Friday in the Minecraft Marketplace with 75% off Daily Doorbusters, a free skin pack, and so much more!
entries.articleBody: Minecraft Marketplace is having its fourth annual Block Friday Sale from November 23rd through November 29th. Enjoy huge savings up to 75% off select content, and a free skin pack! Check in every day for new amazing deals all week long.

entries.title: Happy Anniversary!
entries.text: Join the party from May 26 to June 8 to claim your party favors.
entries.articleBody: We're throwing a birthday bash to celebrate Minecraft Dungeons' first anniversary –and you're all invited! Join the Anniversary Event from May 26 to June 8 to earn a set of birthday-themed party favors you wouldn't want to miss.

entries.title: Block of the Week: Blackstone
entries.text: A closer look at the Nether's equivalent of cobblestone!

entries.title: Cloud Saves are coming to Minecraft Dungeons
entries.text: Cloud Saves let you to save your cross-platform progress so you can pick up and play your save from any supported device!
entries.articleBody: Cloud Saves are coming to Minecraft Dungeons, bringing new cross-platform functionality as part of the free game update releasing on May 5. The Cloud Save feature allows you to save your cross-platform progress so you can pick up and play your save from any supported device.
